body.name: Ziqarr FHD 1080p All-in-One Webcam with Light and with Built-in Noise Reduction Microphone, Privacy Cover, Mini-Tripod and 110° Field of View for Streaming, Conferencing, Meetings and Gaming
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 15 hrs 8 mins
Or fastest Same-Day pickup Today 2 PM - 6 PM. Order within 4 hrs 38 mins
features: ✔🖥️【1080P FULL HD WEBCAM WITH 110 DEGREE WIDE FOV】 - Ziqarr FHD Webcam is equipped with High Definition 1920 x 1080P resolution with automatic exposure and white balance adjustment. The 110 degrees wide field of view is perfect for business or academic presentations, small or large group video chats, solo web streaming, gaming or meeting purposes.

✔🔒【BUILT-IN PRIVACY COVER & TOUCH CONTROL 3 LEVEL RING LIGHT (HIGH LUMINOSITY)】 - Our webcam with light features an adjustable ring light for use in low light, with touch control for easy adjustments. It also includes a built-in privacy cover for security when not in use, ensuring peace of mind. The physical privacy cover also protects lens from fog and dust.

✔📐【INCLUDES a MINI-TRIPOD STAND & COMPLETE FREEDOM of ROTATION】 - The webcam has a tripod-ready universal clip and it comes with its very own mini-tripod stand too. This gives you three different setup options for your webcam. The webcam also gives you the freedom to rotate it 360 degrees on the vertical axis and greater than 90 degrees on the horizontal axis.

✔🎤📸【BUILT-IN OMNI-DIRECTION MICROPHONE and 2.1 MP CAMERA】 - Our webcam features an omni-directional mic with noise-reduction for clear sound in calls and streams, up to 19 feet away. With a 2MP CMOS chip and a high-performance image processor, it ensures clear high quality visuals and smooth streaming.

✔🔌🌐【PLUG & PLAY (NO SOFTWARE NEEDED) and WIDELY COMPATIBLE with other APPS】- It is quick and easy to get started with Ziqarr FHD Webcam. Install and use the webcam instantly without needing to use any additional drivers. It uses a USB2.0/USB3.0 interface connection. It works on Windows 7/8/10; Mac OS 10.6; Chrome OS 29.0.1547.70; Linux 2.6. 24; Ubuntu Linux 10.04; or higher

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ZIQARR FHD WEBCAM - A FUSION OF SUPERIOR VISUALS, CRYSTAL-CLEAR AUDIO, AND INNOVATIVE DESIGN EMPOWERS YOU TO CONNECT AND COMMUNICATE WITH THE WORLD SEAMLESSLY AND SECURELY Ideal for remote work, classes, or family calls, Ziqarr Webcam offers a 110° field of view and noise-reducing mic for crisp video and audio. Stay connected with clear visuals and sound up to 19ft away.

ENHANCE YOUR GAMING, WEB STREAMING OR HOME OFFICE SETUP HIGHLY VERSATILE DESIGN PROVIDING FOUR ADDITIONAL FEATURES LIKE BUILT-IN MICROPHONE, BUILT-IN PRIVACY COVER, BUILT-IN ADJUSTABLE RING LIGHT AND TRIPOD Prioritizing your privacy, the Ziqarr Webcam features a unique cover protecting the lens from dust and fog. The touch control LED Ring Light has 3 brightness levels, easily adjustable for various environments. With its tripod-ready design, universal clip, and mini-tripod stand, setting up is a breeze. The adjustable top rotates 360 degrees vertically and >90 degrees horizontally for optimal positioning.

SEE YOURSELF IN NEW LIGHT ADJUSTABLE HIGH INTENSITY RING LIGHT Equipped with a 3-level adjustable ring light, it delivers perfect lighting in any situation. Impress clients and colleagues with crystal-clear resolution, and easily adjust the brightness to suit your needs.

BE SEEN AND BE HEARD WITH CLARITY CRYSTAL-CLEAR AUDIO AND VIDEO An ideal choice for video calls, live streaming, online teaching, conferences, and gaming. This versatile webcam offers a high-resolution camera, omni-directional built-in microphone, ring lights, mini-tripod stand, universal clip holder, and a privacy cover. Enjoy sharp visuals with a fixed focus and 30 FPS.

MULTIPLE SETUP OPTIONS UNIVERSAL CLIP HOLDER, TRIPOD READY BASE WITH A MINI-TRIPOD Capture any shot from any angle and distance. Ziqarr webcam has a highly flexible design letting you set it up however you like wherever you like.

GET STARTED INSTANTLY SUPPORTS WIDE VARIETY OF APPLICATIONS Compatible with popular platforms like YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, Skype, Zoom, and more, the webcam supports MJPEG, YUY2, H.264 image compression formats. Easy to use, simply plug and play without additional drivers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars “Versatile and User-Friendly: A Game-Changer for Video Conferencing!”
reviews.reviewText: I recently picked up this webcam, and I must say, it’s been a game-changer for my video conferencing experience. The unique hinge mount that easily adjusts between my laptop and desktop monitor is incredibly convenient. I love the touch light adjustments, which allow me to fine-tune the lighting with just a tap of a finger. It’s so unique and easy to use!The privacy cover is another standout feature, making me feel secure that the camera is definitely off when I’m not using it. Plus, the included tripod is a nice touch, helping me get that perfect angle for my calls. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it worked seamlessly with a USB-C adapter I had lying around, making it even more versatile.The quality of this webcam is top-notch, with less lag and stutter compared to my built-in laptop cam. It’s easily adjustable up and down, and the 360° rotation is fantastic for finding the right position. And the brightness? It’s even brighter than my neon signs, as you can see in my photo!All in all, this webcam has exceeded my expectations. From the thoughtful design to the high-quality performance, it’s clear that a lot of thought has gone into making this a reliable and user-friendly device. Whether for work or personal use, I highly recommend giving this webcam a try. It’s been a valuable addition to my setup, and I think you’ll love it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Comprehensive Review of the 1080p Adjustable Ring Light Webcam Four-in-One
reviews.reviewText: This comprehensive review will delve into this webcam’s key features, performance, and overall suitability for streaming, conferencing, meetings, and gaming.Design and Build Quality:The built-in ring light encircling the lens is a standout feature, providing excellent illumination even in low-light environments, resulting in clear and well-lit video quality. The webcam is sturdily constructed and feels durable, while the privacy cover adds an extra layer of security for users concerned about their privacy.Video Quality:The webcam's 1080p resolution delivers sharp and crisp visuals, making it perfect for both professional video conferences and content creation. The 110° field of view captures a wide area, allowing for seamless group discussions during meetings or immersive gaming experiences.Built-in Noise Reduction Microphone:It effectively minimizes background noise, ensuring clear and distortion-free audio during calls and streams. Whether you're in a noisy office or a busy household, the microphone ensures that your voice comes through loud and clear, enhancing overall communication quality.Versatility and Convenience:The webcam's four-in-one design is a game-changer, combining a high-quality webcam, ring light, noise reduction microphone, and a mini-tripod in a single package. This versatility makes it an ideal choice for a wide range of applications, from professional video conference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Video Quality and Microphone
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this webcam and I've been generally pleased with my experience. The setup was a breeze, thanks to the plug-and-play nature of the device. I had it unboxed, plugged in, and operating in less than five minutes.The video quality is impressive, delivering clear and sharp images even in lower light conditions. The resolution is as advertised, and the colors are vibrant and accurate.The built-in microphone is surprisingly good as well. It does an excellent job of minimizing background noise, and my voice always comes through clearly.The webcam's design is sleek and it fits well on top of my monitor. The adjustable clip is sturdy and allows for easy positioning. It even has a privacy cover, which is a nice touch for those concerned about privacy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, practical and does well what its suppose to do.
reviews.reviewText: Took my chances in buying this one, as I liked the design. But turned out to be a perfect one.1. As far as the video quality goes, 5 star for it. The FHD quality and the wide angle it covers is far better than the one had previously that I got from a local retailer for the same price.2. Sits well on top of the display. The connection wire behind the cam positioned in the middle so it doesn't pull the cam back or to an angle when moving positions. Multiple level adjustments let's to position the cam as desired. And the 360° rotation comes in handy.3. The built in ring light with touch control and provided tripod might come in handy for some simple indoor vlogging or the light might just help for home offices with less natural light.4. Finally the built-in microphone is a hit and miss. The clarity is good but since it sits away from the speaker at all times, the volume would be a bit faint for the receiving person. But, everyone would use a separate headphones for that purpose anyway.But overall happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It took me 3 minutes to decide to return it
reviews.reviewText: Why did I returned it? The image quality on the borders of anything is constantly flickering.I have a dresser behind me with the pattern and the pattern is constantly moving as the contour lines are not well defined (and flickering).I don't know who made the previous reviews that look more like a product description, but I can tell you that I could have ignored the cheap plastic look and feel if only the image quality was anything but decent.Bless amazon that accept returns of this cheap products.Going back to Logitech...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and the features
reviews.reviewText: Here are some of the pros I found after using the webcam:**Pros:*** High-quality video* Good built-in microphone captured my voice clearly* Built-in privacy cover (nice little addition)* Ring light was one of the brightest I have seen* Tripod was an added bonusI haven't found a con yet, I am still using it if I found one I will update the review.Overall, I am very happy with this webcam so far and would definitely recommend it to others.
